channel.title: [Video Tut] Series
channel.description:
Hey, I hope to be making some video tutorials to help with the basics and intermediate levels of HTML, and PHP.
So here is a list of the videos I have made so far. These do have sound and hopefully you will learn from them!
NOTE: These are hosted on my computer, and are made 100% by me unless stated below.
[b]HTML[/b]
[b]Video 1[/b]: The very basics (reference for later videos) [url=http://choobisle.no-ip.info:8080/movies/html/basics/1.html]Link[/url]
[b]Video 2[/b]: Tables Not made yet
[hr] [b]PHP[/b] [b] Video 1[/b]: The very basics Not made yet

item.title: [Video Tut] Series
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ok, but it will be soon… Just late now… plus, I make video tutorials for Moparscape too, just the basic yet. So Right Now i have a lot going on, maybe too much…

But yeah I know what you mean.

Plus:
I’m making a website for the movie directory so it just doesn’t have the directory listed. Then I will be done and will make more movies. Going to bed now though.

GOOD NIGHT!

item.description:

I’d suggest that you wait to release something that you call a series until there is actually more than one video, cause one video is not a series
